name: Your Story...
description:
Your Story is Interactive story created with Twine in 36 hours, at amberjam15

Your Story is a story of the immigrant who has stucked in Turkey, while he was in Turkey for a business meeting.

When he was in the meeting, he got an sms that hints Syrian civil war has just started.

As Player, we are making decisions for Syrian engineer, who is in the dilemma of returning back or staying in Turkey for his good.
